name: Questions
author: RiceKirby
summary: Is this even Mafia? Nah. Answer 3 questions correctly and win the game. Any wrong answer and you are out! [Want to submit questions? Check this: http://goo.gl/qDHWL1 ]

sides.winmsg: Congratulations! ~Players~ answered correctly their 3 questions and won this game!
